PHRASE.LANG: Get everyone’s attention and then blow them away. When you bring this little guy out, no one’s going to want to mess with you. [#Legal]
Attirer l'attention de tout le monde, puis de les souffler. Quand vous apportez ce petit bonhomme sur, personne ne va vouloir jouer avec vous. [#Legal]
Get everyone’s attention and then blow them away. When you bring this little guy out, no one’s going to want to mess with you. [#Legal]
